name: Zimba Custom Tailor Online
overview:
With an exceptional collection of archives (65,000 patterns and 200,000 drawings dating from the firm’s creation), Zimba Custom Tailor is, more than ever, a symbol of exception, of perfection, distinguished by icons fashioned from breath and exalted by fire. With the support of twenty-five talented research-oriented Craftsmen, Zimba Custom Tailor has always drawn inspiration from its roots, its craftsmanship and its heritage to transmute tradition into creation.

Zimba Custom Tailor transmits its unique expertise through technical innovations and stylistic, daring and exceptional partnerships with elite craftsmen (pattern cutters, sewing teams, embroiders) to transcend its excellence, becoming a major international luxury Custom Clothing Brand.

As a travelling tailor to United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Germany, France, Singapore, Brazil etc. we have very large customer base in these countries. Now with our online version, we’re all set to support our existing customer base and also increasing new customers.
